product_name: Patagonia Piton Hybrid Fleece Jacket - Women's
long_description: The Piton Hybrid jacket is the most durable, wind-resistant fleece in the Patagonia lineup. Its trim design works well on brisk fall hikes, mixed climbing burns and uphill skinning in a snowstorm. Flexible hybrid design lets you wear the jacket as a moderate-conditions outer layer until it's time to don a full-on shell. Features Polartec(R) Wind Pro(R) with Hardface(R) Technology in key areas: elbows and front, then wrapping over the shoulders and down to mid-back. Wind Pro's durable face is water repellent and abrasion resistant; the Durable Water Repellent finish adds extra protection. Remaining areas of main body use super breathable, stretchy and wicking Polartec(R) Power Dry(R) fabric; smooth jersey face slides easily beneath layers. Warm brushed-fleece interior moves moisture quickly to the fabric face. Microfleece-lined collar, chin guard; stretch binding on cuffs and hem. Zippered handwarmer pockets are pack- and harness-friendly. No shoulder seams provide pack-wearing comfort. Slim fit. Polartec Wind Pro: 50% recycled polyester/40% polyester/10% spandex. Polartec Power Dry: 54% recycled polyester/40% polyester/6% spandex.
short_description: The Piton Hybrid jacket is the most durable, wind-resistant fleece in the Patagonia lineup. Its trim design works well on brisk fall hikes, mixed climbing burns and uphill skinning in a snowstorm.
